meanings.definition: A wrestling hold in which one person locks their opponent's arm
meanings.sent1: During the match, he trapped his opponent in a tight armlock.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler executed a perfect armlock to gain control.
meanings.sent3: The armlock was so effective that his opponent couldn't escape!
meanings.sent4: Her armlock was like a steel trap, impossible to break free from.
meanings.sent5: The armlock twisted and turned, showcasing his wrestling skills.

meanings.definition: To apply an armlock in a wrestling match
meanings.sent1: He tried to armlock his opponent but couldn't get a good grip.
meanings.sent2: In the final round, he managed to armlock his rival for the win.
meanings.sent3: She armlocked her friend playfully during their practice session.
meanings.sent4: The wrestler armlocked his way to victory, outmaneuvering his opponent.
meanings.sent5: With determination, he armlocked his way through the tournament.
